overview: Vistas of some of the most well-known Spanish locations: Madrid, Barcelona, the bay of St. Sebastian, Burgos, Segovia, Malaga. It shows cock fights, the palace of the Alhambra in Granada and banks filmed from a navigating boat. The film ends with a sunset on the sea suddenly crossed by a steam train and with the picturesque view of a bend in the river seen from above.
title: Impressions of Spain
